levels.description:
Increases the ATK of the next attack to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</>, prioritizing enemies that are not blocked and <$ba.root>Binding</> them for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charge(s)</>
